description: Tony Stark invites Spidey to watch the NBA Finals with him in this TV ad.
title: Spider-Man: Homecoming - NBA Finals Spot #1 - "The Invite" - IGN Video

author: BBC Sport
description: Golden State Warriors reach the NBA Finals by beating San Antonio Spurs, and the Spurs' Manu Ginobili may now retire.
title: Golden State Warriors beat San Antonio Spurs to reach NBA Finals

author: Michael Singer
description: For the third time in as many years, the Golden State Warriors and Cleveland Cavaliers will meet in the NBA Finals.
title: Cavaliers roll past Celtics, advance to NBA Finals showdown with Warriors

author: Sam Amick
description: The Warriors are going to the NBA Finals for the third straight year. And this time, they have a perfect 12-0 record. Are the Cavaliers right behind them?
title: Warriors sweep Spurs, advance to NBA Finals with historic 12-0 record

author:
Andrew Lynch                    

                                    
                        @andrewlynch
description: LeBron James hasn't played this poorly since he lost the NBA Finals to the Dallas Mavericks. What gives?
title: Here's why LeBron James is playing like it's the 2011 NBA Finals all over again

author: Kevin ArnovitzESPN Staff Writer
description: With LeBron James and Stephen Curry elevating the star power, the third Finals between Cleveland and Golden State might make a myth of NBA parity, but the drama of the matchup should prove irresistible.
title: Bring on Cavaliers-Warriors, a long-awaited NBA Finals trilogy

author: TIM REYNOLDS
description: Here they go again. For the third straight year, it's Cleveland and Golden State in the NBA Finals. The 2016 champions versus the 2015 champions . The first "threematch" — rematch of a rematch — in league history. It's the matchup most expected, the matchup most predicted, and probably the matchup the Cavaliers and Warriors wanted as well. Let the hype, and the waiting, begin: Game 1 isn't until June 1.
title: No surprise: It's Cavs-Warriors in the NBA Finals, again

description: Der Golden State Warriors sind einfach nicht zu stoppen. Das Team der Basketball-Stars Stephen Curry und Kevin Durant hat nach dem 129:115 (65:51) bei den San Antonio Spurs problemlos zum dritten Mal nacheinander das Playoff-Finale der nordamerikanischen Profiliga NBA erreicht.
title: Basketball: 4:0-Serie gegen die Spurs - Warriors im Finale der NBA-Playoffs

author:
Nick Schwartz                    

                                    
                        @nick_schwartz
description: Skip Bayless and Shannon Sharpe react to Golden State's undefeated run to the NBA Finals.
title: Skip Bayless says the 2017 Warriors have a chance to be the greatest team ever | FOX Sports

author: AJ Neuharth-Keusch
description: After last year's NBA Finals, the Warriors know all too well how quickly the tables can turn come June.
title: Draymond Green: Warriors' historic 12-0 start 'doesn't mean too much'
